video_prompt: Giant robot's weaponized arm lowers. Young girl, defiant, shifts gaze forward. Sky transitions, clouds drift. Ground subtly changes, vegetation sways. Light alters, casting new illuminations. Robotic eyes flicker.
image_prompt: Giant anime-style Gundam robot (dark blue, black, white, yellow, red accents, green glowing eyes, huge shoulders, powerful limbs, rifle-equipped left arm) stands against a bright blue sky with fluffy clouds. A confident young girl with long orange hair, green eyes, and a gothic black dress stands in front of the colossal robot on broken, rusty ground with hints of green vegetation. Bright clear day lighting. Vibrant anime/manga aesthetic.
refined_video_prompt: A massive arm lowers, its integrated weapon system activating. A young girl's determined gaze shifts and locks forward, her expression hardening into defiance. Sky coloration dynamically shifts as clouds swiftly traverse. Ground undulations cause vegetation to sway and tremble. Illumination dramatically alters, casting shifting shadows and glints. Robotic eyes intensely flicker.
